channel.title: Need Help Please
channel.description:
Hey Guys, Need Help with this error...
The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Not Sure What To Do. Thanks.

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @mrniel101 mrniel101
item.description:
@mrniel101 wrote:

Well Im Sorry I Didn’t know bro I dont script that. I script html and php I need to learn java.

How Do I Fix It?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @mrniel101 mrniel101
item.description:
@mrniel101 wrote:

No, Because it exits out as soon as I run the server:

@echo off
color 0a
title DemolishScapeV3
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Is one of the sources I use and it just exits out as soon as I try to start it up…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @mrniel101 mrniel101
item.description:
@mrniel101 wrote:

Yup because thats what I did.
I made a CLASSPATH and a PATH

CLASSPATH
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin
PATH
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin

Thats what I did. Post the one I should do.
